channel.title: Chapter 09: Auto-Encoders on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 09: Auto-Encoders on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 09.01: Unsupervised Learning
item.description: We explain unsupervised learning tasks and unsupervised representation learning.

item.title: Chapter 09.02: Manifold Learning
item.description: In this section, we explain the manifold hypothesis and manifold learning with AEs.

item.title: Chapter 09.03: Auto-Encoders
item.description: In this section, we will explain task and structure of Auto-Encoder.

item.title: Chapter 09.03: Regularized Autoencoders
item.description: In this section, we explain overcomplete AEs, sparse AEs, denoising AEs and contractive AEs.

item.title: Chapter 09.05: Specific Autoencoders and Applications
item.description: For the image domain, using convolutions is advantageous. Can we also make use of them in AEs? In this section, we answer this question and overview some applications.
